Hide-Show Graphs

Version:MissionOS_2.0

You can hide or show graphs based on requirements when multiple instruments get plotted on a single graph. This option is helpful to turn off all the graphs and then select individual instruments to view it graphically.

Select Instrument Type and Instrument IDs from Instrument Selection box.

Click Graph It to get the graph thumbnail.

 

 

Click View Large or click on the thumbnail.

Select Hide All Graphs from the graph menu. All graphs get hidden from plot area and instrument IDs become greyed out from legend.

 

 

Click an instrument ID in the graph to view the corresponding individual graph.

 

 

 

 

To reverse this action and plot all instruments back on to the graph, you can select the option Show All Graphs. Again, instruments can be hidden individually.
